process_id.title: process_id
process_id.description: Identifier for the process to be used.

atom_id.title: atom_id
atom_id.description: Identifier for the atom involved in the process.

job_trigger_url.title: job_trigger_url
job_trigger_url.description: The endpoint URL for triggering the job.

job_status_url.title: job_status_url
job_status_url.description: The endpoint URL for checking the job status.

poll_frequnecy.title: poll frequency
poll_frequnecy.description: The time interval to check job status in seconds.Not reqyuired! Defaults to 600 seconds if not provided

webhook_url.title: Teams webhook url
webhook_url.description: OPTIONAL: Please input a webhook url if you want to get status update on your teamms channel
